attributes.action: Distinguish between the able bodied and disabled to prevent discrimination with the proposed smoking ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please reconsider the public smoking ban as a lot of disabled people do not have the mobility to go outside and smoke and to apply this equally to all citizens amounts to people such as myself unable to enjoy a night out in a pub etc or being forced to quit against our will.
